translations.text: I do swear by this city ˹of Mecca˺—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: even though you ˹O Prophet˺ are subject to abuse in this city—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and by every parent and ˹their˺ child!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, We have created humankind in ˹constant˺ struggle.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ

translations.text: Do they think that no one has power over them,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ayahsabu an lan yaqdira AAalayhi ahad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Do they think that no one sees them?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Have We not given them two eyes,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and shown them the two ways ˹of right and wrong˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: If only they had attempted the challenging path ˹of goodness instead˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And what will make you realize what ˹attempting˺ the challenging path is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: It is to free a slave,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ

translations.text: or to give food in times of famine
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: or to a poor person in distress,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ

translations.text: and—above all—to be one of those who have faith and urge each other to perseverance and urge each other to compassion.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma kana mina allatheena amanoowatawasaw bissabri watawasaw bilmarhama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: These are the people of the right.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ

translations.text: As for those who deny Our signs, they are the people of the left.<sup foot_note=77622>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: The Fire will be sealed over them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
